Contents: DM me and i will give you the context for each of these files

but instructions:
1. clone the lm harness repo locally
2. under lm_eval/tasks add an axiom task
3. there are three files that you will need to create: axiom.yaml, axiom_variation.yaml, util
it might be a bit difficult for u to implement it in this short time span
